actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to eliminate the time limitation on the provision of educational assistance to veterans who served on active duty at any time during the Vietnam era or thereafter.

summary.text: Eliminates the time limitation on the provision of educational assistance to veterans who served on active duty at any time during the Vietnam era or thereafter.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to eliminate the time limitation on the provision of educational assistance to veterans who served on active duty at any time during the Vietnam era or thereafter.
